subject: Hockey, Ice
Sports Injuries
lead_paragraph: Manny Malhotra’s season appeared over when he was hit in the eye with a puck March 16, but the Canucks are “cautiously optimistic” he will play in the finals.
snippet: Manny Malhotra’s season appeared over when he was hit in the eye with a puck March 16, but the Canucks are “cautiously optimistic” he will play in the finals.
